decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal, by reason of its prominent location and siting of the building, would fail to respond positively within its context, in relation to the adjoining buildings and would fail to maintain or enhance the character of the street scene and the visual interests of its immediate surroundings. Accordingly, the proposal would fail to meet the high quality design aspirations of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021), and would be contrary to Policy D3 (1)(11) of the London Plan (2021), Core Policy CS1B of The Harrow Core Strategy 2012, Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies 2013, the adopted Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide 2010 and would not be within the tolerances of Class AA, Part 20, Paragraph AA.2(e) of the General Permitted Development Order (2015) as amended.
description: Additional two Storeys (height 6.5 m ) of development containing 12 flats on a detached commercial or mixed use building - maximum overall height 17.4 m (Prior approval of  transport and highways impacts; air traffic and defence asset impacts; contamination risks; flooding risks; the external appearance of the building; fire escape; waste storage; the provision of adequate natural light in all habitable rooms of the new dwellinghouses; impact on the amenity of the existing building and neighbouring premises;  impacts of noise from any commercial premises on the intended occupiers of the new dwellinghouses;  impacts of the introduction of, or an increase in, a residential use of premises in the area on the carrying on of any trade, business or other use of land in the area and impact on a protected view)
